creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: Changing the navigation title via the menu from the site tab does not stick.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
I you use the metadata section for the page and change the title there, the
change will be saved.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
However, changing the metadata does not seem to change the actual title being
displayed for that page. If I go back into edit navigation title, I get the
original title.
